price: 45. Si uu Alle ugu abaal mariyo kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha  fala deeqdiisa; hubaal Alle ma uu jecla gaalada.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
